name: Drew's Adventure DEMO
description:
I'M STILL WORKING ON IT!!!!!!!!

Have a demo :)

When it prompts you to pick a difficulty, remember that it can be changed at any time in the menu! Warrior Mode doubles enemy stats, and halves your battle rewards!

Credits (There's none in game)--------------------------------------------------------------------

Engine/Music/SFX - RPG Maker MZ

Characters/other NPC things - My friends/other random things that I'm inspired by

Art/Story/Events/Everything else - Me! :]

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Known bugs: The enemies will randomly just turn into slow things with like 1 HP. 

IDK why but I'm working to fix it! When it happens, just save and quit.

Have fun on an adventure with some dorky dudes. Get kidnapped, kill dogs, all the RPG things. Have fun!
